scheme_name: Scheme for Assistance to Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises (MSME): Assistance for Raising Capital through SME Exchange
details: The scheme "Scheme for Assistance to Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises (MSME)" is an umbrella scheme launched by the Industries and Mines Department, Gujarat. It aims to empower the state's dynamic MSME sector, which significantly contributes to employment, GDP, and exports. Effective from August 7th, 2020 to August 6th, 2025, this initiative supports entrepreneurs and strengthens MSMEs, making them globally competitive.
benefits: Financial Assistance: MSMEs can avail of 25% reimbursement of expenses incurred in raising funds through the SME Exchange, up to ₹5,00,000/-.
Equity Capital Support: Helps MSMEs raise equity capital for business expansion and growth.
Encouragement for Listing: Incentivizes MSMEs to get listed on the SME Exchange, improving visibility and credibility.
eligibility: The enterprise must be registered as an MSME at the time of listing.
The MSME must have successfully raised equity capital through the SME Exchange.
The enterprise must apply within one year of the listing date.
The fundraising should be as per the approved scheme by the SME Exchange.
application_process: Fill in the Registration Form. Click on "Submit".
Verify the E-mail ID using the link sent on your registered E-mail ID.
After verification, you will be registered successfully.
Enter the email address and password you used during registration.
Click the "Login" button to access your account.
Now fill in the required details and mandatory documents about your business to complete the application process.
documents_required: Constitution of Enterprise (Memorandum & Articles of Association).
Copy of SME Exchange Registration Listing related letter by BSE/NSE/SME Exchange.
CA Certificate regarding MSME status as per MSMED act-2006 as on listing date.
Audited Balance Sheet of last financial year/Annual Report.
CA Certificate of expenditure statement for equity raise through SME Exchange with total and subtotal Headwise.
Copy of Bills for Expenditure incurred.
Copy of Self Certified Share Holding Pattern (if applicable).
Copy of Pan card of the Enterprise and Promoters/partners/directors, and Authorised Signatory.
